rooms.description: Spacious living area featuring Art Deco style decor with geometric patterns and elegant furniture.
Modern dining space complementing the living room for formal meals.
Comfortable guest bedroom with adjoining balcony for relaxation and fresh air.
Functional workspace designed in Art Deco style that doubles as a home office.
Storage and laundry area with efficient space utilization.

openings.description: A grand Art Deco entrance gate leading to the living area.
Separate access balconies for each bedroom providing direct outdoor views and garden proximity.
Pathway leading from the living area to a large swimming pool situated in the garden area.

rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with private balcony offering scenic garden views and adherence to Vastu principles.
Elegant secondary master bedroom with its own balcony for privacy and tranquility.
Well-appointed bedroom featuring a balcony designed per Vastu principles to enhance energy flow.
Additional bedroom with access to a private balcony for comfort and light.

openings.description: Each bedroom features a separate balcony that overlooks the garden and ensures adequate natural lighting.
A service staircase providing access to both floors, ensuring easy movement for maintenance and guests.
